item.title: End UT-270 North (West Temple) at US-89 (400 South)
item.description: End UT-270 North (West Temple) at US-89 (400 South). Use 400 South for I-15 north.

item.title: UT-270 North (West Temple) at UT-269 West (500 South)
item.description: UT-270 North (West Temple) at UT-269 West (500 South) in Salt Lake City.

item.title: UT-270 South (West Temple) - To I-80 East/I-15 South
item.description: UT-270 South (West Temple) - To I-80 East/I-15 South in Salt Lake City. These type of signs directing traffic to I-15 and I-80 with the white background are all over downtown Salt Lake City.
